ebooks.author: George Orwell
ebooks.quote: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.
ebooks.description: A dystopian novel about a totalitarian regime that uses surveillance, manipulation, and mind control to maintain power. A classic exploration of government, freedom, and individualism.

ebooks.title: The Alchemist
ebooks.author: Paulo Coelho
ebooks.quote: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
ebooks.description: A young Andalusian shepherd embarks on a journey to find treasure, discovering the deeper meaning of life and his own personal legend along the way.

ebooks.title: Fairy Tale
ebooks.author: Stephen King
ebooks.quote: There's a dark well in everyone, I think, and it never goes dry. But you drink from it at your peril. That water is poison.
ebooks.description: A supernatural thriller in which a teenager discovers a portal to a twisted version of reality, forcing him to confront a dark force that threatens both worlds.

ebooks.title: The Metamorphosis
ebooks.author: Franz Kafka
ebooks.quote: I cannot make you understand. I cannot make anyone understand what is happening inside me. I cannot even explain it to myself.
ebooks.description: A novella about Gregor Samsa, a man who wakes up one morning transformed into a giant insect, exploring themes of isolation, identity, and alienation.

ebooks.title: Atomic Habits
ebooks.author: James Clear
ebooks.quote: You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems.
ebooks.description: A self-help book that outlines practical strategies for forming good habits, breaking bad ones, and mastering the tiny behaviors that lead to remarkable results.

ebooks.title: I Will Teach You to Be Rich
ebooks.author: Ramit Sethi
ebooks.quote: The most important thing is to start. Do not wait until you have everything figured out.
ebooks.description: A guide to personal finance that covers everything from budgeting to investing, aimed at young professionals who want to take control of their financial futures.

ebooks.title: The Analyst
ebooks.author: John Katzenbach
ebooks.quote: The mind is a terrible thing to waste, but it's also a dangerous thing to use.
ebooks.description: A psychological thriller about a psychoanalyst who becomes the target of a mysterious game played by a patient who seems to know everything about him.

ebooks.title: Siddhartha
ebooks.author: Hermann Hesse
ebooks.quote: I have always thirsted for knowledge, I have always been full of questions.
ebooks.description: A philosophical novel about a young man named Siddhartha's quest for enlightenment, exploring themes of self-discovery, spirituality, and the meaning of life.

ebooks.title: The Steppenwolf
ebooks.author: Hermann Hesse
ebooks.quote: I am trying to understand the world. I am trying to understand myself. But I am also trying to understand that I can never understand.
ebooks.description: A novel that delves into the mind of Harry Haller, a man caught between two worlds, grappling with his dual nature and his desire to transcend his human limitations.

ebooks.title: Demian
ebooks.author: Hermann Hesse
ebooks.quote: One must find the source within one's own Self, one must possess it. Everything else is a delusion.
ebooks.description: A novel about a young man's journey to self-realization, exploring themes of spirituality, the search for truth, and the conflict between individuality and society.

ebooks.title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
ebooks.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
ebooks.quote: The world was so recent that many things lacked names, and in order to indicate them it was necessary to point.
ebooks.description: A landmark work of magic realism, this novel tells the multi-generational story of the Buendía family in the fictional town of Macondo, blending the fantastic with the real.

ebooks.title: Pedro Páramo
ebooks.author: Juan Rulfo
ebooks.quote: They all came to life when they saw me. They were waiting for me.
ebooks.description: A surreal and haunting novel about a man named Juan Preciado, who travels to the town of Comala to find his father, only to encounter the spirits of the dead.

ebooks.title: The Divine Comedy
ebooks.author: Dante Alighieri
ebooks.quote: Midway upon the journey of our life, I found myself within a forest dark, For the straightforward path had been lost.
ebooks.description: A three-part epic poem that explores the soul’s journey through Hell (Inferno), Purgatory (Purgatorio), and Paradise (Paradiso), blending theological, philosophical, and personal reflections.

ebooks.title: Thus Spoke Zarathustra
ebooks.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
ebooks.quote: And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music.
ebooks.description: A philosophical novel that presents the teachings of Zarathustra, a prophet who proclaims the death of God and introduces concepts such as the Übermensch (Superman) and the eternal recurrence.

ebooks.title: Love is a Dog From Hell
ebooks.author: Charles Bukowski
ebooks.quote: I wanted the whole world or nothing.
ebooks.description: A collection of Bukowski’s raw, gritty poetry, exploring themes of love, despair, alienation, and the human condition in the modern world.

ebooks.title: Meditations
ebooks.author: Marcus Aurelius
ebooks.quote: You have power over your mind, not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
ebooks.description: A series of personal writings by the Roman Emperor, offering practical advice on Stoicism, virtue, and the importance of inner peace in the face of external chaos.
